section.title: Purpose of this document
section.para: This document aims at giving the user all the information he/she needs in order to set a suitable environment for the BioPreDyn software suite prototype (deliverable 7.2 of the BioPreDyn project), as long as basic instructions on how to use it.
This document does not describe the architecture of the deliverable 7.2 nor gives details about its implementation; this will be detailed respectively in the requirements guide and the design notes.

section.title: Audience
section.para: This document is primarily intended to advanced users willing to test the BioPreDyn software suite prototype on their own model. As a proof of concept for more advanced versions (deliverables 3.4 / 8.3), very little effort is put on the package user-friendliness; it is assumed that the reader knows how to compile and build code using GNU make, CMake, or Visual Studio.

section.title: Organization
section.para: This guide is divided into four main sections:

formalpara.title: Introduction
formalpara.para: A short introduction to the project context, and how the current document fits in the global picture.

formalpara.title: Installation
formalpara.para: How to install a suitable environment for working with the BioPreDyn software suite prototype on multiple platforms.

formalpara.title: Usage
formalpara.para: How to use the BioPreDyn software suite prototype.
